name: Vakalatnama

fields.label: Type of Case
fields.placeholder: Civil Suit / Criminal Case / Writ Petition / etc.

body: I, {{client_name}}, son/daughter/wife of {{client_father_name}}, resident of {{client_address}}, do hereby appoint and authorize {{advocate_name}}, Advocate, Enrollment No. {{advocate_enrollment_no}}, to act, appear, and plead on my behalf in the matter of:
2. I hereby authorize the said Advocate to:
3. I undertake to ratify and confirm all acts, deeds, matters, and things lawfully done by the said Advocate pursuant to this Vakalatnama.
4. This Vakalatnama shall remain in force until the final disposal of the said matter, including all appellate proceedings.
IN WITNESS WHEREOF, I have signed this Vakalatnama on {{date}}.

ACCEPTED

I accept the above Vakalatnama.
